title: Fa ntoboa ma Orbital Asɔredan
heading: Wie Wo Ntoboa no
chooseHow: Paw ɔkwan a wobɛfa so awie wo ntoboa a wotua tow no:

option1.heading: Ɔkwan a Ɛto so 1: Fa Ntoboa Ma Wɔ Intanɛt So Mprempren
option1.description: Fa credit card, debit card, anaa akwan foforo a wɔfa so tua sika wɔ Intanɛt so denam yɛn sikasɛm mu boafo a ahobammɔ wom, The Field , so wie wo ntoboa no ntɛm ara. Wo nsa bɛka tow ho krataa ntɛm ara.
option1.button: Fa ntoboa denam The Field → so

option2.heading: Ɔkwan a Ɛto so 2: Sika a Wɔde Sie Sikakorabea Ma The Roy Foundation
option2.description: Fa sika to sikakorabea tẽẽ anaasɛ fa telefon kɔma The Roy Foundation , yɛn yɔnko dwumayɛni ne sikasɛm mu ɔboafo. Saa kwan yi ye ma ntoboa akɛse anaa amanaman ntam nneɛma a wɔde kɔ amannɔne.
option2.instructions: Yɛsrɛ wo fa " Orbital Temple - {donationType} " ka ho wɔ nkyerɛkyerɛmu afã no mu. Sɛ wowie wo transfer no wie a, email yɛn wɔ sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art fa wo transfer ho nsɛm ka ho na woanya wo toɔ krataa.
option2.button: Di Yɛn Nkitahodi Fa Deposit Ho →

taxInfo.heading: Tow a Wɔtew So a Wɔde Ma
taxInfo.description: Orbital Temple yɛ adwuma a The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , 501(c)(3) ahyehyɛdeɛ a ɛnyɛ nea wɔhwehwɛ mfasoɔ na ɛboa. Wobetumi atwe tow afi U.S. ntoboa nyinaa so akodu baabi a mmara ma ho kwan.
taxInfo.questions: Nsɛmmisa? Di yɛn ho nkɔmmɔ wɔ gabriela.veiga@orbitaltemple.art
